code:
%% AZ-305 Domain 1: Management Group Hierarchy with Policy Inheritance
%% Reference: Azure Landing Zone architecture - CAF best practices
%% Exam Focus: Resource organization, policy inheritance, governance scope

flowchart TB
    subgraph ROOT[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        direction TB
        ROOT_MG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

        subgraph PLATFORM[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
            direction TB
            PLATFORM_MG[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

            IDENTITY_MG[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            MGMT_MG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            CONN_MG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

            IDENTITY_SUB[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            MGMT_SUB[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
            CONN_SUB[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        end

        subgraph LANDING[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            direction TB
            LZ_MG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

            CORP_MG[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            ONLINE_MG[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

            CORP_PROD[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
            CORP_DEV[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            ONLINE_PROD[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            ONLINE_DEV[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        end

        subgraph SANDBOX[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
            SANDBOX_MG[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
            SANDBOX_SUB[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        end

        DECOMM_MG[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end

    %% Hierarchy connections
    ROOT_MG --> PLATFORM_MG
    ROOT_MG --> LZ_MG
    ROOT_MG --> SANDBOX_MG
    ROOT_MG --> DECOMM_MG

    PLATFORM_MG --> IDENTITY_MG
    PLATFORM_MG --> MGMT_MG
    PLATFORM_MG --> CONN_MG

    IDENTITY_MG --> IDENTITY_SUB
    MGMT_MG --> MGMT_SUB
    CONN_MG --> CONN_SUB

    LZ_MG --> CORP_MG
    LZ_MG --> ONLINE_MG

    CORP_MG --> CORP_PROD
    CORP_MG --> CORP_DEV
    ONLINE_MG --> ONLINE_PROD
    ONLINE_MG --> ONLINE_DEV

    SANDBOX_MG --> SANDBOX_SUB

    %% Policy inheritance indicators
    INHERIT1[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    EXEMPT[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    %% Styling
    classDef rootStyle fill:#1a1a2e,stroke:#16213e,color:#fff,stroke-width:3px
    classDef platformStyle fill:#0f4c75,stroke:#3282b8,color:#fff,stroke-width:2px
    classDef lzStyle fill:#2e7d32,stroke:#4caf50,color:#fff,stroke-width:2px
    classDef sandboxStyle fill:#f57c00,stroke:#ff9800,color:#fff,stroke-width:2px
    classDef decommStyle fill:#c62828,stroke:#ef5350,color:#fff,stroke-width:2px
    classDef subStyle fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2,color:#000,stroke-width:1px
    classDef noteStyle fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ff9800,color:#000,stroke-dasharray: 5 5

    class ROOT_MG rootStyle
    class PLATFORM_MG,IDENTITY_MG,MGMT_MG,CONN_MG platformStyle
    class LZ_MG,CORP_MG,ONLINE_MG lzStyle
    class SANDBOX_MG sandboxStyle
    class DECOMM_MG decommStyle
    class IDENTITY_SUB,MGMT_SUB,CONN_SUB,CORP_PROD,CORP_DEV,ONLINE_PROD,ONLINE_DEV,SANDBOX_SUB subStyle
    class INHERIT1,EXEMPT noteStyle

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'。
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 这一块。
